description.english: Pick up a silencer for SMG.
description.spanish: Recoge un silenciador para la SMG.
description.schinese: 捡起消音 SMG。
description.brazilian: Pegue um silenciador para a SMG.

description.english: Find "interesting" photos.
description.spanish: Encuentra fotos "interesantes".
description.schinese: 找到 "有趣" 的照片。
description.brazilian: Encontre fotos "interessantes".

displayName.schinese: 它是基础。它也是德尔塔基地

description.english: Finish the campaign.
description.spanish: Completa la campaña.
description.schinese: 完成战役。
description.brazilian: Termine a campanha.

description.english: Equip a protection suit.
description.spanish: Equipate con el traje de protección.
description.schinese: 装备防护衣。
description.brazilian: Equipe um traje de proteção.

description.english: Turn on emergency power supply after the disaster.
description.spanish: Encienda el suministro de energía de emergencia después del desastre.
description.schinese: 灾害发生后打开应急电源。
description.brazilian: Ligue o fornecimento de energia de emergência após o desastre.

description.english: Meet Diana after the disaster.
description.spanish: Encuentra a Diana después del desastre.
description.schinese: 遇见灾难后的戴安娜。
description.brazilian: Encontre Diana após o desastre.

description.english: Demolish the jammed door.
description.spanish: Derriba la puerta atascada.
description.schinese: 拆除卡住的门。
description.brazilian: Destrua a porta emperrada.

description.english: Take a trip on the monorail train.
description.spanish: Haz un viaje en el tren monorraíl.
description.schinese: 搭乘单轨列车。
description.brazilian: Faça uma viagem no monotrilho

description.english: Get the cargo down to the railcar.
description.spanish: Lleva la carga hasta el vagón.
description.schinese: 将货物放到轨道车上。
description.brazilian: Leve a carga até o vagão ferroviário.

description.english: Turn off the light and leave the basement.
description.russian: Выключить свет и покинуть подвальные помещения.
description.spanish: Apaga la luz y sal del sótano.
description.schinese: 关灯，然后离开地下室。
description.brazilian: Apague a luz e saia do porão.

displayName.english: Hurry up, before he looks away from us...
displayName.russian: Давай быстрее, пока он не видит….
displayName.spanish: Date prisa, antes de que aparte la mirada de nosotros...
displayName.schinese: 快点，趁他还没把目光从我们身上移开...
displayName.brazilian: Se apresse, antes que ele desvie o olhar de nós...

description.english: It seems you've been robbed of something valuable.
description.russian: Кажется, у Вас стащили кое-что ценное.
description.spanish: Parece que te han robado algo valioso.
description.schinese: 看起来你被抢走了什么贵重的东西。
description.brazilian: Parece que algo valioso foi roubado de você.

description.english: Stabilize the power generator.
description.spanish: Estabiliza el generador de energía.
description.schinese: 稳定发电机。
description.brazilian: Estabilize o gerador de energia.

displayName.schinese: 我们得救了...或者还没有？

description.english: Transmit a SOS signal from the helipad.
description.russian: Послать сигнал SOS на вертолетной площадке.
description.spanish: Transmite la señal de SOS desde el helipuerto.
description.schinese: 在直升机停机坪发射 SOS 信号。
description.brazilian: Transmita um sinal SOS do heliponto.

description.english: Find Diana in the tunnels.
description.spanish: Encuentra a Diana en los túneles.
description.schinese: 在隧道中找到戴安娜。
description.brazilian: Encontre Diana nos túneis.

description.english: Diana equipped a protection suit.
description.spanish: Diana se equipó un traje de protección.
description.schinese: 戴安娜穿上防护服。
description.brazilian: Diana equipou um traje de proteção.

description.english: Find yourself in the alien world.
description.spanish: Llega hasta el mundo alienígena.
description.schinese: 发现自己身处外星世界。
description.brazilian: Encontre-se no mundo alienígena.

description.english: Visit a rotating radioactive asteroid.
description.spanish: Visita un asteroide radiactivo y giratorio.
description.schinese: 拜访一颗旋转的放射性小行星。
description.brazilian: Visite um asteroide radioativo rotativo.

displayName.spanish: Un momento de ternura que te deja sin aliento
displayName.schinese: 令人心跳加速的可爱时刻
displayName.brazilian: Momento de fofura de parar o coração

description.english: Enter the portal.
description.spanish: Entra al portal.
description.schinese: 进入传送门。
description.brazilian: Entre no portal.

displayName.schinese: 不仅仅是一个游戏玩家
displayName.brazilian: Mais do que apenas um gamer

description.english: Finish the game on medium difficulty.
description.spanish: Termina el juego en dificultad media.
description.schinese: 在中等难度下完成游戏。
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo na dificuldade média.

description.english: Finish the game on hard difficulty.
description.spanish: Termina el juego en dificultad difícil.
description.schinese: 在困难难度下完成游戏。
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo na dificuldade difícil.

description.english: Prevent security officer from listening to music.
description.spanish: Evita que el oficial de seguridad escuche música.
description.schinese: 阻止警卫听音乐。
description.brazilian: Impeça o oficial de segurança de ouvir música.

description.english: Find a bottle of healing liquid and drink it.
description.russian: Найти и выпить бутылку с лечебной жидкостью.
description.spanish: Encuentra una botella de líquido curativo y bébelo.
description.schinese: 找到并喝掉一瓶治疗药水。
description.brazilian: Encontre uma garrafa de líquido curativo e beba.

description.english: Kill the headcrab inside the healing pod.
description.spanish: Mata al headcrab dentro de la cápsula curativa.
description.schinese: 杀死治疗舱内的猎头蟹。
description.brazilian: Mate o headcrab dentro do ponto de cura.

description.english: Destroy all alien hives in Xen.
description.russian: Уничтожить все инопланетные ульи в Зене.
description.spanish: Destruye todas las colmenas alienígenas en Xen.
description.schinese: 摧毁Xen的所有外星蜂箱。
description.brazilian: Destrua todas as colmeias alienígenas em Xen.

description.english: You were squashed by a cargo container.
description.spanish: Fuiste aplastado por un contenedor de carga.
description.schinese: 你被一个集装箱压扁了。
description.brazilian: Você foi esmagado por um contêiner de carga.

description.english: Kill the bullsquid before it gets into the hurricane.
description.russian: Успеть убить буллсквида до того, как его затянет в торнадо.
description.spanish: Mata al bullsquid antes de que entre en el huracán.
description.schinese: 在牛乌贼进入飓风之前杀死它。
description.brazilian: Mate o bullsquid antes que ele entre no furacão.

description.english: Find a shotgun early.
description.spanish: Encuentra una escopeta temprano en el juego.
description.schinese: 提前找到霰弹枪。
description.brazilian: Encontre uma espingarda logo no início.

displayName.english: I said don't go in there
displayName.brazilian: Eu disse para não entrar lá

description.english: Enter the barricaded room against the scientist's advice.
description.russian: Зайти в заблокированную комнату вопреки словам ученого.
description.spanish: Entra en la habitación bloqueada en contra del consejo que dió el científico.
description.schinese: 不听科学家的建议，进入被锁住的房间。
description.brazilian: Entre na sala barricada contra o conselho do cientista.

displayName.schinese: 哎呀，没有什么私人恩怨

description.english: Blow up the container with the scientist inside.
description.spanish: Explota el contenedor que contiene al científico dentro.
description.schinese: 炸毁装有科学家的集装箱。
description.brazilian: Exploda o contêiner com o cientista dentro

description.english: Get caught in an alien storm and successfully die there.
description.russian: Попасть в инопланетный торнадо и благополучно там умереть.
description.spanish: Queda atrapado en una tormenta alienígena y muere allí con éxito.
description.schinese: 被吸入外星风暴并成功死在里面。
description.brazilian: Fique preso na tempestade alienígena e morra lá com sucesso.

displayName.spanish: De todos modos, ya estás muerto
displayName.schinese: 不管怎么说，你已经死了
displayName.brazilian: De qualquer forma, você já tá morto

description.english: Kill a struggling scientist in the basement.
description.russian: Убить оказавшегося в непростой ситуации ученого в подвальных помещениях.
description.spanish: Mata a un científico que lucha en el sótano.
description.schinese: 在地下室杀死一名苦苦挣扎的科学家。
description.brazilian: Mate um cientista que está lutando por sua própria vida no porão.

description.english: Unlock all rooms with supplies inside.
description.russian: Открыть все запертые двери с припасами.
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las habitaciones que contengan suministros.
description.schinese: 解锁所有装有补给品的房间。
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as salas com suprimentos dentro.

description.english: Watch the post-credits scene.
description.spanish: Mira la escena post créditos.
description.schinese: 观看片尾字幕场景。
description.brazilian: Assista à cena pós-créditos.

displayName.english: It was difficult, but I succeeded
displayName.russian: Это было трудно, но я смог!
displayName.schinese: 这看起来很难，不过我做到了

description.english: Save the security officer from three zombies in the lab.
description.russian: Спасти охранника от трех зомби в лабораториях.
description.spanish: Salva al oficial de seguridad de los tres zombies en el laboratorio.
description.schinese: 在实验室中从三个僵尸手中救下警卫。
description.brazilian: Salve o oficial de segurança de três zumbis no laboratório.

description.english: Get through the place after parking without destroying an enemy SUV.
description.russian: Пройти место после парковки, не уничтожая вражеский внедорожник.
description.spanish: Atraviesa el lugar después de estacionarte sin destruir una camioneta enemiga.
description.schinese: 从停车场出来后在不摧毁敌方 SUV 的情况下通过区域。
description.brazilian: Consiga passar pelo local após o estacionamento sem destruir um SUV inimigo.

description.english: Turn on the power and open the fence door without killing Garg.
description.russian: Включить питание и поднять решетку на железной дороге не убивая Гарга.
description.spanish: Enciende la energía y abre la puerta de la cerca sin matar al Gargantua.
description.schinese: 打开电源并打开栅栏门，而无需杀喷火怪。
description.brazilian: Ligue a energia e abra a porta da cerca sem matar Garg.

description.english: Survive the Xen arena without using the healing pool.
description.russian: Пройти арену в Зене, не наступая на жидкость в лечащем водоеме.
description.spanish: Sobrevive en la Arena Xen sin usar la piscina de curación.
description.schinese: 在Xen竞技场中幸存下来而不使用治疗池。
description.brazilian: Sobreviva à arena Xen sem usar a piscina de cura.

description.english: Save the scientist from zombie in the lab.
description.russian: Спасти ученого от зомби в лабораториях.
description.spanish: Salva al científico del zombi en el laboratorio.
description.schinese: 在实验室中从僵尸手中救下科学家。
description.brazilian: Salve o cientista do zumbi no laboratório.

description.english: Activate the guard robot at the robot factory.
description.spanish: Activa el robot guardián en la fábrica de robots.
description.schinese: 在机器人工厂启动警卫机器人。
description.brazilian: Ative o robô de guarda na fábrica de robôs.

description.english: Dump the chemicals.
description.spanish: Desecha los productos químicos.
description.schinese: 倾倒化学品。
description.brazilian: Descarte os produtos químicos.

description.english: Drink 25 soda cans.
description.spanish: Bebe 25 latas de refresco.
description.schinese: 喝下 25 罐汽水。
description.brazilian: Beba 25 latas de refrigerante.

description.english: Kill three alien controllers with the under-barrel grenade launcher.
description.russian: Убить трех контроллеров из подствольного гранатомета.
description.spanish: Mata a tres controladores alienígenas con el lanzagranadas.
description.schinese: 用枪管下的榴弹发射器杀死三个异型指挥官。
description.brazilian: Mate três controladores alienígenas com o lança-granadas da M16

description.english: Behead 25 enemies.
description.spanish: Decapita a 25 enemigos.
description.schinese: 斩首 25 个敌人。
description.brazilian: Decapite 25 inimigos.

description.english: Behead 60 enemies.
description.spanish: Decapita a 60 enemigos.
description.schinese: 斩首 60 个敌人。
description.brazilian: Decapite 60 inimigos.

description.english: Behead 125 enemies.
description.spanish: Decapita a 125 enemigos.
description.schinese: 斩首 125 个敌人。
description.brazilian: Decapite 125 inimigos.

displayName.brazilian: É hora de acertar as contas!

description.english: Kill six enemies in a row with a single clip from your revolver without changing weapons.
description.russian: Убить шесть врагов подряд из револьвера за одну обойму и без смены оружия.
description.spanish: Mata a seis enemigos seguidos con un solo cargador de tu revólver sin cambiar de arma.
description.schinese: 用左轮手枪上的一个弹夹连续杀死六个敌人而不更换武器。
description.brazilian: Mate seis inimigos seguidos com um único carregador de seu revólver sem trocar de arma.

description.english: Destroy 10 Xen Trees.
description.spanish: Destruye 10 Árboles Xen.
description.schinese: 摧毁 10 棵xen树。
description.brazilian: Destrua 10 Árvores Xen.

description.english: Destroy 25 Xen Trees.
description.spanish: Destruye 25 Árboles Xen.
description.schinese: 摧毁 25 棵Xen树。
description.brazilian: Destrua 25 Árvores Xen.

description.english: Get additional points of armor from the technician three times.
description.russian: Получить дополнительные единицы брони от техника три раза.
description.spanish: Obtén puntos de armadura adicionales con el técnico en tres ocasiones.
description.schinese: 三次从技术人员那里获得额外的护甲。
description.brazilian: Receba pontos adicionais de armadura do técnico três vezes.

displayName.brazilian: A força está com a razão

description.english: Destroy one Robotic Infantry unit with a melee weapon.
description.russian: Завалить одного роботизированного пехотинца в ближнем бою.
description.spanish: Destruye una unidad de infantería robótica con un arma cuerpo a cuerpo.
description.schinese: 用近战武器摧毁一个机器人步兵单位。
description.brazilian: Destrua uma unidade de Infantaria Robótica com uma arma de combate corpo a corpo.

description.english: Behead a zombie using the pipe wrench.
description.russian: Снести голову зомби при помощи разводного ключа.
description.spanish: Decapita a un zombi usando la llave de caño.
description.schinese: 用管钳斩首僵尸。
description.brazilian: Decapite um zumbi usando a chave inglesa.

displayName.english: To use a sledgehammer to crack a nut
displayName.spanish: Un mazo para romper una nuez
displayName.brazilian: Usar um martelo para quebrar uma noz

description.english: Kill five headcrabs with the sniper rifle.
description.russian: Убить пять хэдкрабов из снайперской винтовки.
description.spanish: Mata a cinco headcrabs con el rifle de francotirador.
description.schinese: 用狙击步枪杀死五只头蟹。
description.brazilian: Mate cinco headcrabs com o rifle de precisão.

description.english: Kill two enemies with the Light Gun in one shot.
description.russian: Убить двух врагов из Световой Пушки за один выстрел.
description.spanish: Mata a dos enemigos con el Arma de Luz de un solo disparo.
description.schinese: 用光枪一枪杀死两个敌人。
description.brazilian: Mate dois inimigos com a Arma de Luz em um único tiro.
